channel.title: Vue on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Vue on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Using Vue to Develop Front Ends
item.description: I am using (VUE)[http://vuejs.org] to develop the frontend of (moni)[http://rustyeddy.com/projects/moni] I really like Vue, though I am not a frontend developer nor much of a JavaScript fan. Developing with Vue makes sense to me, the Single File Component (SFC) really fits my way of programming and thinking about code. I like it!
